text: Susana Dosamantes Rul Riestra (9 January 1948 – 2 July 2022), was a Mexican actress. == Early life and career == She is the mother of Mexican pop diva Paulina Rubio, She has appeared in around 50 movies and TV series, including telenovelas. On 11 January 2011, her ex-husband died from kidney cancer. In her final years Dosamantes worked in the United States so that she could live near her daughter, Paulina. Both Susana and Paulina lived in Miami, Florida. Dosamantes died on 2 July 2022 at the age of 74, in Miami from pancreatic cancer. ==Filmography== *2012: Corazón Apasionado....Doña Úrsula Campos Miranda de Villacastín *2010: Eva Luna....Marcela *2008: El Juramento ....
